QuestData.Title: Smokey and the Bandage
QuestData.Description: Hey there! Interested in makin' a buck?$b$bI need to get a bandage. Well, actually, I got a friend who needs to get a bandage. Well actually... let's just say it's complicated, but if you go get this bandage, you make money. And so do I. And my friend. Possibly other people.$b$bStephen Browman used to own the mill to the north, now he's dead. A zombie. The guy at the top wants to have the wrappings from Browman's body.$b$bWhat's the matter, you don't like money?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Browman's Wrappings from Stephen Browman at Browman's Mill.
QuestData.CompletionText: You've been fightin' undead. Did ya find Browman?
QuestData.RewardText: Well well well! Someone who goes and gets things done! Here's your cut, $g chief: sweetie;. I'll be seein' you around.
